company.name: Razorpay
company.description: India's leading payment gateway and financial services platform

products.name: Payment Gateway
products.description: Accept payments online with 100+ payment methods including cards, UPI, wallets, and net banking

products.name: Payment Links
products.description: Create and share payment links instantly without any technical integration

products.name: Subscriptions
products.description: Automate recurring payments and subscription billing

products.name: Route
products.description: Split payments automatically to multiple accounts

products.name: RazorpayX
products.description: Complete banking solution for businesses with current accounts, payroll, and vendor payments

faq.question: What does Razorpay do?
faq.answer: Razorpay is India's leading payment gateway that helps businesses accept, process and disburse payments online. We offer payment solutions, banking services, and lending products for businesses of all sizes.

faq.question: What payment methods do you support?
faq.answer: We support 100+ payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, UPI, net banking, wallets like Paytm and PhonePe, EMI options, and international cards.

faq.question: Do you have a free tier?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a free tier with no setup fees or annual maintenance charges. You only pay transaction fees when you receive payments.

faq.question: What are your transaction fees?
faq.answer: Our transaction fees start from 2% for domestic payments. International payments have different rates. Exact pricing depends on your business volume and requirements.

faq.question: Who is Razorpay for?
faq.answer: Razorpay serves businesses of all sizes - from startups and SMEs to large enterprises. We cater to e-commerce, SaaS, marketplaces, education, healthcare, and various other industries.

faq.question: How quickly can I integrate Razorpay?
faq.answer: Integration can be completed in as little as 15 minutes using our APIs and SDKs. We provide comprehensive documentation and developer support.

faq.question: Do you provide business banking services?
faq.answer: Yes, through RazorpayX we offer current accounts, automated payroll, vendor payments, tax payments, and other banking services designed for businesses.

faq.question: Is Razorpay secure?
faq.answer: Yes, we are PCI DSS Level 1 compliant and use bank-grade security. We're regulated by the Reserve Bank of India and follow strict security protocols.

faq.question: Do you offer customer support?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 customer support through phone, email, and chat. We also have dedicated relationship managers for enterprise clients.

faq.question: Can I use Razorpay for international payments?
faq.answer: Yes, we support international payments and can help you accept payments from customers worldwide in multiple currencies.
